1.0.name: wordpress/followthis-topic-box
1.0.description:
The plugin (installation done in a few minutes) helps you to gain frequent readers and visitors. Users follow topics on your page with only 1 klick and will be allerted frequently if you do have new content they are interested in. Your readers then receive an email journal with short teaser which directly lead to your page.

Users find the followthis plugin on many websites and follow without a new registration, only a social login is needed: * Facebook * Google * Twitter * OpenID * etc.

You just need to activate the plugin, do a short registration and the followthis topic box appears beneath your blog posts. (Topics will be extracted by the plugin automatically from your post or taken from your meta keywords / tags / categories. The news articles will be send to the user also without any tasks on your side.) The plugin helps you to: * gain users coming back to your page frequently * raise traffic * get insights about topics your visitors like

These are the re
